metadata.Title: CVE-2020-12626 on Ubuntu 18.04 ESM (bionic) - medium
metadata.Description:
An issue was discovered in Roundcube Webmail before 1.4.4. A CSRF attackcan cause an authenticated user to be logged out because POST was notconsidered.

    Update Instructions:

    Run `sudo pro fix CVE-2020-12626` to fix the vulnerability. The problem can be corrected
    by updating your system to the following package versions:

roundcube - 1.3.6+dfsg.1-1ubuntu0.1~esm2
roundcube-core - 1.3.6+dfsg.1-1ubuntu0.1~esm2
roundcube-mysql - 1.3.6+dfsg.1-1ubuntu0.1~esm2
roundcube-pgsql - 1.3.6+dfsg.1-1ubuntu0.1~esm2
roundcube-plugins - 1.3.6+dfsg.1-1ubuntu0.1~esm2
roundcube-sqlite3 - 1.3.6+dfsg.1-1ubuntu0.1~esm2
Available with Ubuntu Pro: https://ubuntu.com/pro

criterions.comment: roundcube package in esm-apps/bionic was vulnerable but has been fixed (note: '1.3.6+dfsg.1-1ubuntu0.1~esm2').
